title: Wondering about Project loot

embed.description: Unlocking PROJECT Materials and content Bundles and Gemstones FAQ PROJECT returns to the Rift with new skins and a path to joining First Strike, which unlocks a unique border for loading scre...

body:
Towards the bottom the post says:
"WHAT HAPPENS TO MY BLUEPRINTS AND CORES WHEN THE EVENT IS OVER?
All PROJECT content will stay in your Hextech Crafting inventory once the event is over. If you prefer a tidy inventory, you'll be able to disenchant all PROJECT materials into a little bit of essence."

I just wanted to know if we have an ETA for when we can do so.

replies.body:
I don't have an ETA for this, but I'm definitely in the same boat of wanting to clean my inventory up a bit. 

Keep your eyes peeled for an announcement on this, which should be posted [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) when it goes out. Let me know if you have any questions.

I think it'd be neat if I could disenchant multiple Project Cores at a time. I have 200 of them left over and I'd rather not sit here for 20 minutes disenchanting one at a time, getting 2 orange essence per core. Possibly a "Disenchant All" button. Just a suggestion, inquiry or whatever. I mean if I gotta do it, I will but its time consuming. Thank ya


- Ø
They stated that it will be possible to in the next patch. We should be able to do so later this patch since they've published that article in the 6.16 Patch.
